text: iGoogle was a customizable Ajax-based start page or personal web portal. It was launched by Google in May 2005. It was discontinued on November 1, 2013. As of October 17, 2007, it was available in 42 languages, and in over 70 country domain names. 7.1 million people were using it in February 2007. == References == == Other websites == * iGoogle on the Internet Archive Category:American search engines Category:2005 establishments in the United States Category:2013 disestablishments in the United States
title: IGoogle
